tasks.title: Create a New User Account
tasks.action: Go to /marriage and submit a dummy application, or go to /signup (if enabled).
tasks.expected_outcome: You should be logged in and redirected to /dashboard/user (because your role is 'user' by default).

tasks.title: Access the User Dashboard
tasks.expected_outcome: You should see the dashboard with 'My Applications', 'Visit Instructions', and your user initials in the header.

tasks.title: Verify Application Tracking
tasks.action: Check the 'My Applications' list on the dashboard.
tasks.expected_outcome: If you just submitted a form, it should appear here with status 'Pending' (or 'Submitted'). If not, it should show authorized empty state.

tasks.title: Check Visit Instructions
tasks.action: Look for the blue 'Visit Instructions' card on the right side.
tasks.expected_outcome: It should clearly list the 3 steps: Bring IDs, Bring Birth Certificates, Provide App Code.

tasks.title: Test Navigation
tasks.expected_outcome: The main content area should update to show the relevant page without a full page reload.

tasks.title: View Profile
tasks.expected_outcome: You should see your email address, role (User), and a placeholder for avatar and name.
